titleStmt.title: Love's a lottery and a woman the prize with a new masque call'd Love and riches reconcil'd : as it was acted by His Majesties servants at the theatre in Lincolns-Inn-Fields.
titleStmt.author: Harris, Joseph, ca. 1650-ca. 1715.
